items.title: Temporarily hacking my account to publish tweets from the official HackCamp: http://twitter.com/h...

object.content:
Temporarily hacking my account to publish tweets from the official HackCamp: http://twitter.com/hackcamp account. It should only be announcements and only for the next 40 hours.

Apologies in advance.

items.title: HackCamp in Google London office canteen detected, with the ideas starting from Taxi Ripoff Detec...

object.content: HackCamp in Google London office canteen detected, with the ideas starting from Taxi Ripoff Detector for Android that compares route taken with ideal route from routing API to (Web based) IDE for iPad. TWIMC it runs today till midnight, and tomorrow as well.
